str2: Properly, to stare at, i.e. to discern clearly; by extension, to attend to; by Hebraism, to experience; passively, to appear.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
Probably prolonged from hals; the sea.
Glassy, made of glass, transparent. From hualos; glassy, i.e. Transparent.

str2: To mix, mingle. A primary verb; to mix.

On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
Glassy, made of glass, transparent. From hualos; glassy, i.e. Transparent.

str2: A prolonged form of a primary stao stah'-o; to stand, used in various applications.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

str2: To conquer, be victorious, overcome, prevail, subdue. From nike; to subdue.

And, even, also, namely.

str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

Name, character, fame, reputation. From a presumed derivative of the base of ginosko; a 'name'.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
A harp, lyre. Of uncertain affinity; a lyre.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
